item.description: Apple is poised to issue iOS 18.3.2, a mystery new iPhone update coming ahead of iOS 18.4. What's in the upgrade and when will it arrive?

item.title: Fewer Than One In Five Cities Meet Air Quality Guidelines, Study Finds
item.description: The IQAir 2024 World Air Quality Report also found just seven countries met WHO annual average guidelines around PM2.5 particle pollution.
